title: Nancy Cartwright
summary: Nancy Jean Cartwright (born October 25, 1957)[1] is an American voice actress. She is best known for her long-running role as Bart Simpson on the animated television series The Simpsons, for which she has received a Primetime Emmy Award for Outstanding Voice-Over Performance and an Annie Award for Best Voice Acting in the Field of Animation. Cartwright also voices other characters for the show, including Nelson Muntz, Ralph Wiggum, Todd Flanders, Kearney, Database, and Maggie.
